actions.name: Manifold Bridge

cost.trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.

Effect: The triggering effect does not affect the user, and the target is relocated 30-WC metres in the direction of the user's choice.

actions.name: Tensor Contraction

cost.trigger: The user declares the use of an Action or Ability with a target other then Self.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares the use of an Action or Ability with a target other then Self.

Effect: The user freely moves, using Teleport Movement, to a spot within 8m of a target in Range.

actions.name: Spacial Rend
actions.description: Effect: On hit, non-[Legendary] targets are @Affliction[lifted] 3. The user may spend 4 PP to have this attack lose [Blast 6] and change its Range to 15m Wide Line until their next Activation.

system.description:
Trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.

Effect: Connection - Spacial Rend. The triggering effect does not affect the user, and the target is relocated 30-WC metres in the direction of the user's choice. When the user declares the use of an Action or Ability with a target other then Self, the user may use Tensor Contraction.
